Metadata.title: LegalFox - Legalization of Foreigners in Poland, Residence Permits, Citizenship, Company Registration
Metadata.description: LegalFox - assistance for foreigners in Poland with obtaining Residence Permits (Blue Card, temporary and permanent residence, EU resident card), Polish citizenship, company registration (JDG, Sp. z o.o.), as well as consultations on legalization, document processing, car registration, driver's license replacement, PIT-37 calculations, and other services.
Metadata.keywords: Legalization in Poland, Residence Permit, Blue Card, Permanent Residence, EU Resident Card, company registration in Poland, Polish citizenship, documents in Poland, assistance to foreigners, LegalFox

HeroSection.title: Legalization Services in Poland
HeroSection.subTitle: Professional assistance in obtaining residence permits, permanent residency, and Polish citizenship. Comprehensive legalization services: from obtaining a residence card to starting a business. Individual approach and support at every stage. We work for your peaceful future in Poland.

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.subTitle: We offer a full range of services for legalizing and employing foreigners in Poland, with an individual approach to each client.

cards.heading: Residence Card
cards.content: Comprehensive handling of all types of residence cards: temporary stay (Czasowy), permanent stay (Stały), EU Blue Card (Blue Card), and EU resident card. Grounds: work, study, family reunification, marriage to a Polish citizen, business, and more.

cards.heading: Starting and Managing a Business
cards.content: Assistance in setting up a company (JDG, Sp. z o.o.), consultations on legalization through business, and managing business activities in Poland. Full support at all stages.
list: Assistance in setting up a company (JDG, Sp. z o.o.)
Advice on managing business activities in Poland
Full support at all stages of your business development

cards.heading: Polish Citizenship
cards.content: Assistance in obtaining Polish citizenship. We guide you through all stages of the process, ensuring the most effective path to acquiring citizenship.
list: Assessment of your chances of obtaining citizenship
Preparation of the necessary document package
Support at all stages of the process

cards.heading: Marriage and Family Matters
cards.content: Assistance in registering marriages in Poland, legalization based on marriage or cohabitation with a Polish citizen, and family reunification.
list: Legalization based on marriage with a Polish citizen
Legalization based on cohabitation with a Polish citizen

cards.heading: Documents and Registrations
cards.content: Assistance in obtaining various documents: PIT-37 tax return, vehicle registration, driver's license exchange. Assistance in obtaining 800+ or RKO 1000+ benefits.
list: PIT-37 tax return preparation and submission
Assistance in obtaining 800+ or RKO 1000+ benefits
Other types of registrations and document handling

cards.heading: Consultation
cards.content: We offer individual consultations to discuss all issues related to legalization and immigration. We thoroughly analyze your situation and provide the best solutions.

cards.heading: Services for Employers
cards.content: For employers, we offer comprehensive and professional services for those who are just starting to employ foreigners in their company, as well as for those who want to extend the stay and employment of their current employees.
list: Registration of a declaration to employ a foreigner and notification to the labor office
Obtaining a residence and work permit
Annex No. 1 to the temporary residence and work permit
Obtaining information from the county office on the lack of labor market availability
Assistance in verifying and determining the current status of a foreigner
Consultations on choosing a method of work legalization
Preparation and completion of all forms

AboutUsSection.mainDescription: My name is Yuliia Vasylenko, and I am the founder of LegalFox. Our mission is to help foreigners successfully legalize and find employment in Poland by providing expert support at every stage of this complex process.
AboutUsSection.firstDescription: With 8 years of experience in legalization and over 4,000 positive reviews, we are proud to have helped thousands of people find a new home in Poland. Our team of experts knows all the intricacies of Polish law and is ready to guide you through every stage of obtaining the necessary documents - from temporary residence permits to Polish citizenship.
AboutUsSection.secondDescription: At LegalFox, we understand that every case is unique. That's why we offer individual solutions tailored to your specific circumstances. Our goal is not just to prepare documents, but to find the most effective path to your legalization in Poland.
AboutUsSection.thirdDescription: Your positive outcome is our responsibility. We don't just promise results, we guarantee them. Our team works with full dedication to ensure the successful resolution of your case.
